txt.en: The great Warg Gloomfang and his pack-master can be found in Hîgropor, tucked away on the upper levels of the south-east corner of the pass of Nan Wathren.\n\nYou should defeat the brutal terrors of Hîgropor, and destroy the idols that lead there.

The great Warg Gloomfang and his pack-master can be found in Hîgropor, tucked away on the upper levels of the south-east corner of the pass of Nan Wathren.\n\nYou should defeat the brutal terrors of Hîgropor, and destroy the idols that lead there.
Captain Trotter is in Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should return to Captain Trotter and tell him that you have successfully crippled the war effort gathering in Nan Wathren.
Tell Captain Trotter of your success in Nan Wathren

'I... I cannot believe it. Truly, [placeholder]... you were able to enter that pass and leave again with your life intact? It is incredible. You have halted what would have been certain war for our people. You have saved the good folk of Trestlebridge, saved their homes and livelihoods.\n\n'I cannot thank you enough!'
You have combed much of Nan Wathren, but there is one corner yet unexplored. Your heart warns you that this last venture deep into the pass will be dangerous.

You have combed much of Nan Wathren, but there is one corner yet unexplored. Your heart warns you that this last venture deep into the pass will be dangerous.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Fellowship recommended.</rgb>
